    kompare - Android widget for price comparison released

    Maik Buchmeyer

    Full stack & mobile engineer. CTO at AIR at en-japan

    • Tokyo
    • Twitter
    • Github

    The kompare price comparison widget was released to the Play Store just a few days ago.

    I created this widget within 2 months of programming after work as a small project to get to know how widgets work on android. I really want to move on to build a real app, as widgets can be a real pain in the a** :) Anyway I think the result is find - itâ€™s working and looks nice. Give it a try and save some money while grocery shopping.

    Find all the details at the project page.
